website_summaries.verdict: Concerns over subpar quality make it easier to suggest spending a bit more on a more durable sauna suit.
cons: Reports of suits ripping after only a few months worth of wear

customer_reviews.title: Top is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love mine, but the pants rip too easy... I still use my top that's why I give it 3stars ... I order my suit bigger so it would be loose so that's not the reason it ripped because it was too tight. I wish it held up better this my second suit bought the first one somewhere else awhile back thought maybe it had improved.
customer_reviews.author: Fenia ....e!!

customer_reviews.title: Sauna suit
customer_reviews.text: These last about two summers. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lattimer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.. material can rip easily
customer_reviews.text: The top is great and aids in me getting a good sweat in my workout since its been cold. However my pants ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Daima L Boger

customer_reviews.title: Pants ripped
customer_reviews.text: Ripped in a few days, not durable. Try the one by ARD
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: ripped the second time i wore it
customer_reviews.text: Pants ripped without hardly any use at all, and not intense use. i would like my money back!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Only the first time is open
customer_reviews.text: Is really bad product i not recommend not loos u money
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: VERY effective. Received sooner than promised. Quite sturdy. Best sauna suit used in years.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Torn when delivered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this through here because i had recently purchased the same suit through walmart and the pants were torn. I love the top which I still use. But also wanted the pants. The Delivery was great. But as soon as i recieved the package I opened it and again the pants were torn. I could've purchased a better one for the price of the 2 that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic suit
customer_reviews.text: Suit is a very thin plastic. It ripped second time of wearing, so very delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia0_0

customer_reviews.title: My first upsetting product on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: After wearing this one time my pants ripped and I got them a size larger so no they were not too tight
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Brown-Raub

customer_reviews.title: fits well
customer_reviews.text: I have used and torn so many sauna suits but this one seems to be lasting longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Russell

customer_reviews.title: The pant seems to be very delicate and ripped even ...
customer_reviews.text: The pant seems to be very delicate and ripped even though it was way loose to me. I couldn't even do most my workout. And the top had torn of on my hand. Still need to see if they will return or exchange this item.
customer_reviews.author: SRAVANI

customer_reviews.title: Rips
customer_reviews.text: Owned 2 of them, always rip. Not bad but if you plan physical activity the material is too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ripped
customer_reviews.text: the bottoms split at the seam after the 3rd use on tread mill at a fast walk very disappointed buy this product guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: herbert parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product works great, is very comfortable. I would recommend this product i love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Get over he plastic smell and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: William Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not cool
customer_reviews.text: After one wear at the gym. My pants tore on the inner thigh. I was only walking on the treadmill for 20 minutes before they tore.
customer_reviews.author: Thomacina Martin

customer_reviews.title: For a better workout, wear the suit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for a good sweaty workout. I wear this suit every time i work out especially doing zumba and bike riding. You get the sweat out. Great fitting and I would recommend this product to anyone who wants to melt into their floor with a good sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: They're just taking our money with no problem
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an entry level sauna suit to just dip my feet in. There is a reason this product is soooo cheap! I read the reviews but still bought it anyway (my mistake). I even bought the suit two sizes too big to ensure that it wouldn't break. Today was the first day I had it out, and it broke! Ripped on a 15 minute walk. What the actual... with all the money Gold's Gym makes you would think they would thoroughly test their product through multiple stresses to see if its a good product. 👎🏿
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my sauna suit it the best sauna suit love it
customer_reviews.author: cynthia forrester

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit doesn't rip in a day like other ones
customer_reviews.author: Randy Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses this suit is starting to fall apart. The elastic pant band has separated from the plastic and a small hole on the side of the pant also. The pant is baggy on me so its not because it was too tight. Not that thrilled with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Calibeach69

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this sauna suit. Oversized so it fits perfect with clothes underneath.
customer_reviews.author: BHC

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product! Would give "0" stars if possible. Used only 8 times doing moderate aerobics and the crouch tore out. Nothing heavy duty about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy but works for me. Use this to contain body heat during mud wraps.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Hanvey

customer_reviews.title: Pants are worthless
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this suit UNTIL I was in the store and my 7 year old daughter screamed "Mommy you have a hole in your pants!!" I swear everyone in the store stopped and turned around to see. I look down and there was a HUGE hole in the crotch area. I did not have on shorts so you could see my beautiful flowered underwear. I was so embarrassed. I had to walk through the store with my purse covering my crotch. I still use the top but the pants are worthless.
customer_reviews.author: D-Burks

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I work out at home on my treadmill. I like to walk with the suit on. I also run with the suit on, while on my treadmill. The top is better quality than the bottom. Well, after my third wear of the suit, I had a huge rip in the bottoms in my crotch area, making the bottoms useless. I have since wore the top many times with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: david m joseph

customer_reviews.title: I have gone through 3 of these suits in 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 3 of these suits in 4 months, they always tear at the seam in the crotch. I had one do it in the arm pit. Only use them when I run. I run 3 to 6 miles a day. Looking for a sturdier made suit.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: I'm usually very active and I bought a small/medium I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually very active and I bought a small/medium I swear the pants keep.ripping apart. It's always around the crotch area Be very aware before u buy.this.product
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: Does make you really sweaty but I don't know how to clean it. And it ripped on the second wear I probably wldnt buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Skaterbaby92

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This suit works great but it rips so easy especially if you are a runner. If you are going to get a sauna suit make sure you get a anti-rip one. Plus these suits are way to high on here I got mine from Wal-Mart for $7.77.
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: The suite is great..
customer_reviews.text: I work-out and wear it about 3 times a week. I am cross-training. The suite is great..
customer_reviews.author: Rose Waters

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Well after reading the Reviews it seems the pants are cheezy so I won't be purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Amos

customer_reviews.title: duty
customer_reviews.text: CRAP. I've purchased this one and the heavy duty ones that from this brand. BOTH tore in a matter of days. and ik. ap
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

product_meta.title: Gold's Gym Sauna Suit (size XL-XXL for 42"-50" waist)
product_meta.description: Gold's Gym Sauna Suit (size XL-XXL for 42"-50" waist)
